title: Philippi
content:
Does anybody know where I can buy this greek font family? We happen to have one weight of it (Plain) but require bold etc yet I cannot find anybody that sells it despite extensive Googling.

Very mysterious...

 [‹ premium looking typefaces](http://web.archive.org/web/20080114002758/http:/typophile.com/node/40810 "Go to previous forum topic") [Xerox new brand (with animated ball) and custom font... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080114002758/http:/typophile.com/node/40625 "Go to next forum topic")
author: phunkidude

comments.content:
You can find it [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20080114002758/http:/www.linguistsoftware.com/mg.htm). But as you can see it’s actually another greek Helvetica. So you can download [MGOpenModerna](http://web.archive.org/web/20080114002758/http:/www.ellak.gr/fonts/mgopen/) from Magenta instead.  
George Triantafyllakos - backpacker.gr
